name: Terrestrial Hammer
author: The Djinn
desc:
Target creature touching the earth makes one Dexterity saving throw for each AP spent on this spell. For each failure they take 2d6 bludgeoning damage and are flung 30 feet into the air, taking 1d6 points of damage for each 10 feet of movement obstructed by an object.

Each round for three rounds (or until they touch the ground, fly, or otherwise have their movement stopped), at the start of their turn, they are forced to use their movement to fall up to 30 feet, taking 1d6 points of damage per 10 feet traveled.
